description: This file defines an abstract class 'PojoCodeProducer' responsible for generating Java POJO code and managing dependencies on Enum definitions. It includes methods for processing Enum wrappers to determine which enums need to be generated, specifically those associated with POJO sections excluding event sections.

classes.name: PojoCodeProducer
classes.description: Abstract class for generating Java POJO code, handling dependencies on enum definitions, and implementing template mappings.

methods.name: getEnumsToGenerate
methods.description: Collects and returns a list of EnumDefWrapper objects representing enums that are used in POJO sections but are not yet generated or related to events.
